    <metadata>

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Morje in človek (onesnaževanje)</string>
            <string language="en">Man and see (pollution)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bemannen Sie und sehen Sie (Verunreinigung)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Équipez et voyez (pollution)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Equipe e veja (poluição)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Equipaggi e veda (inquinamento)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το άτομο και βλέπει (ρύπανση)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sirva y vea (contaminación)</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Človeški vpliv na morje, onesnaževanje in zaščita.</string>
            <string language="en">Human influence on the see, pollution and forms of protection.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">onesnaževanje</string>
            <string language="en">pollution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">morje</string>
            <string language="en">see</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">naravni park</string>
            <string language="en">nature park</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlicher Einfluß auf sehen, die 
Verunreinigung und die Formulare des Schutzes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Influence humaine sur le voir, la pollution et les
formes de la protection.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Influência humana ver, na poluição e nos 
formulários da proteção.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Influenza umana sul vist, sull'inquinamento e 
sulle forme di protezione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ανθρώπινη επιρροή βλέπει, ρύπανση και 
μορφές της προστασίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Influencia humana en el ver, la contaminación y 
las formas de protección.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verunreinigung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">sehen Sie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Naturpark</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pollution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
